dmca.title: Instrument Supplier Asks Google to Delist Competitor
dmca.body:
Sight & Sound Productions, Inc
DBA: World Music Supply
Muncie, IN 47304

June 24, 2004
	
Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043
	
Dear Sir or Madam,

	Sight & Sound Productions, Inc, is the creator and copyright owner of various graphics, photos, and web pages that appear on www.worldmusicsupply.com and www.sightandsoundmusic.com. Sight & Sound Productions, Inc. also owns a federal trademark registration for a stylized WORLD MUSIC SUPPLY logo (Reg. No 2,610,927). Sight & Sound Productions, Inc. has learned of various infringements and misappropriations of our copyrights, trademarks by unauthorized third parties, which were discovered through search performed on your search engine. I have forward [sic] this information to my legal counsel. 

Please take the appropriate actions under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act to remove these infringements from your search engine.

1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears or appeared on http://www.worldmusicsupply.com and http://www.sightandsoundmusic.com

2.	Search Query: "World Music Supply" and allintitle "World Music Supply" returning the following infringing Web Pages:
	a.	http://www.gibson-acoustic-guitars-online;
	b.	www.acousticelectricguitars.stringed-instrument.com/contents.htm (view google's cache)

3.	My Contact Information is as follows: [private] President, World Music Supply, [private], Muncie, IN 47302, xxx-xxx-xxxx xxxx, xxx-xxx-xxxx fax, [private]@[private].com.  Also, [private]@[private].com

4.	Infringer's Contact Information: These sites where developed by and controlled by http://www.dpmg.com (Defining presence marketing group) without our knowledge, consent, or control who contact information is as follows:

Mr. [private], President
	Defining Presence Marketing Group, Inc.
		[private]
		[private]
Winnipeg, MB Canada R3T2A7

5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

[private], President
Sight & Sound Productions, Inc
DBA: World Music Supply
Phone: xxx-xxx-xxxx Ext xxx
Fax: xxx-xxx-xxxx
Email: [private]@[private].com
